Title: Requires a holder of a class DJ or MJ learners permit, while operating a vehicle, to display a sign indicating that such vehicle is being driven by a new driver
Summary: Requires a holder of a class DJ or class MJ learner's permit, while operating a vehicle, to display a sign indicating that such vehicle is being driven by a new driver; authorizes the commissioner to create the form and distribution for such sign upon the issuance of the learner's permit.
LawCode: Amd ยง501-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to signage for persons driving under a learner's permit
